profile:
We know your life is busy and there is not enough time to tackle the deep cleaning like you want to. The Cleaning Lady is here to help. 
Getting your home deep-down clean and ready for your personal enjoyment, guests, a party, or ready to sell, is hard work!
The Cleaning Lady provides professional and affordable services to clients in the West Toronto and Etobicoke areas. 
Leave the worry out of the equation by taking advantage of our House Cleaning Service, and letting the experts handle it. 
We’d love the opportunity to work with you and show why our exceptional service sets us apart from the rest of the field. 
WE USE FRAGRANCE FREE AND ECO-FRIENDLY PRODUCTS IN COMBINATION WITH A STEAM MOP FOR A SAFE AND SPARKLING CLEAN!

******

Our rate is the same for every job - $30 per Cleaning Lady Hour.
We supply it all and do it all: Top to Bottom!
- Eco Friendly Cleaning Products & Tools
- Elbow grease
- Experience
- Love


*******


BATHROOM SPARKLE(S):

Clean Sink, Vanity & Mirrors
Clean Toilet
Clean Bathtub & Tiles
Clean Shower Stall & Shower Doors
Remove Spots off Walls
Wash Window Sills
Wash Baseboards
Steam & Sanitize Floor
Empty Garbage
Clean Light Switch Covers & Walls

*******
​​
KITCHEN SPARKLE:

Wash & Put Away Dishes
Clean & Polish Outside Stove, Fridge & Dishwasher
Clean Inside/Outside Microwave Oven
Clean Counter Tops & Small Appliances
Clean Outside Cupboard Doors
Remove Spots off Walls
Wash Window Sills
Wash Baseboards
Wash Floor
Empty Garbage

******
​​
LIVING AREAS & BEDROOMS SPARKLE:

Tidy Up
Make or Change Beds
Clean Pictures and Mirrors on Walls
Dust /Polish Furniture
Vacuum Upholstered Furniture
Vacuum Carpets and Floors
Steam Mop Hardwood Floors
Remove Spots off Walls
Wash Baseboards,  Window Sills & Light Switch Covers
Remove all Garbage
Unmade beds will be made up. 
If you would like any of the beds changed,
simply set out folded sheets
(on the beds needing changing).

Call us today for an appointment. 

*******

SPARKLE NOTE -  
We always do the windows/sliding doors too! 
If you'd like us to clean your oven and interior fridge just ask and we'll schedule the time for that too.

Our mission is to support YOU by adding sparkle to your life!

Call us today for an appointment and a sparkling conversation.
